title: From Sugar Daddy to Sour Daddy
itunes:title: From Sugar Daddy to Sour Daddy
description:
I once was in love with a man 20 years older than me… I was 20 years old when we met. It was supposed to be a sugar daddy, sugar baby relationship. Needless to say, the sex was awesome. Things got extremely difficult when I found out he was a family friend. We decided we would continue with our deeds and keep it a secret. We ended up catching feelings and I was head over heels for this old man and I thought he felt the same way about me.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
